title: Senior Data Scientist
description:
We're excited to announce multiple openings for Senior Data Scientist 1 positions in Delhi, Bangalore, and Chennai! To streamline the application process, we’re using a Google Form, which makes applying faster and easier.




Be sure to fill out the form completely, answer all relevant questions, and carefully review all four job descriptions—each one is slightly different. We’re looking for diverse expertise, including experience with Generative AI, Large Language Models (LLMs), Content Recommender Systems, and other cutting-edge areas in Machine Learning and Deep Learning.




Don’t miss out on the chance to be part of an innovative team—apply now!

Show more
